B.CATEGORY_ID, T.CATEGORY_NAME, T.DESCRIPTION, B.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, B.DEFAULT_VALUE, B.ENABLED_FLAG, B.START_ACTIVE_DATE, B.END_ACTIVE_DATE, B.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, B.REQUEST_ID, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.CREATION_DATE, B.CREATED_BY, B.LAST_UPDATED_BY, B.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, B.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, B.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, B.ATTRIBUTE1, B.ATTRIBUTE2, B.ATTRIBUTE3, B.ATTRIBUTE4, B.ATTRIBUTE5, B.ATTRIBUTE6, B.ATTRIBUTE7, B.ATTRIBUTE8, B.ATTRIBUTE9, B.ATTRIBUTE10, B.ATTRIBUTE11, B.ATTRIBUTE12, B.ATTRIBUTE13, B.ATTRIBUTE14, B.ATTRIBUTE15,B.LEAF_FLAG,B.SORT_NUM
mapper.insert:
select inv_category_b_s.nextval from dual
insert into INV_CATEGORY_B (CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, DEFAULT_VALUE, ENABLED_FLAG, START_ACTIVE_DATE, END_ACTIVE_DATE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15,LEAF_FLAG,SORT_NUM) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCategoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (select company_id from spm_market_b where market_id = #{request.marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leafFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update INV_CATEGORY_B
CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_CATEGORY_ID = #{parentCategoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEFAULT_VALUE = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = (select company_id from spm_market_b where market_id = #{request.marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAF_FLAG = #{leafFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update INV_CATEGORY_B set CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_CATEGORY_ID = #{parentCategoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEFAULT_VALUE = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAF_FLAG = #{leafFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM INV_CATEGORY_B B LEFT JOIN INV_CATEGORY_TL T ON B.CATEGORY_ID = T.CATEGORY_ID AND T.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND B.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID is NULL
order by T.category_name

select ic_t.CATEGORY_ID, ic_t.CATEGORY_NAME from INV_CATEGORY_TL ic_t left join INV_ITEM_CATEGORY ic on (ic_t.CATEGORY_ID = ic.CATEGORY_ID AND ic_t.LANG = #{request.locale, jdbcType = VARCHAR}) where exists (select 1 from inv_item_b b where b.item_type = #{ _parameter, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and b.item_id = ic.item_id) group by (ic_t.CATEGORY_ID, ic_t.CATEGORY_NAME)

select icb.CATEGORY_ID, icbt.CATEGORY_NAME as CATEGORY_NAME from INV_CATEGORY_B icb LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_CATEGORY_TL icbt on (icb.CATEGORY_ID = icbt.CATEGORY_ID AND icbt.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where icb.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' and (icb.END_ACTIVE_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP or icb.END_ACTIVE_DATE is null) and PARENT_CATEGORY_ID != 0

select DISTINCT CB.CATEGORY_ID, CB.CATEGORY_NAME from INV_ITEM_CATEGORY iic LEFT JOIN INV_CATEGORY_B cb on CB.CATEGORY_ID = IIC.CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN INV_ITEM_B iib on iib.item_id = iic.item_id LEFT JOIN INV_ITEM_ASSIGN iia on iia.item_id = iib.item_id where iia.assign_value = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and iia.enabled_flag = 'Y' order BY CB.CATEGORY_ID

select icb.CATEGORY_ID, icbt.CATEGORY_NAME as CATEGORY_NAME from INV_CATEGORY_B icb LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_CATEGORY_TL icbt on (icb.CATEGORY_ID = icbt.CATEGORY_ID AND icbt.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where icb.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'
and (icb.END_ACTIVE_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP or icb.END_ACTIVE_DATE is null) and LEAF_FLAG = 'Y' order by sort_num

select icb.CATEGORY_ID, icbt.CATEGORY_NAME as CATEGORY_NAME,icb.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID,icb.LEAF_FLAG from INV_CATEGORY_B icb LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_CATEGORY_TL icbt on (icb.CATEGORY_ID = icbt.CATEGORY_ID AND icbt.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where icb.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'
and (icb.END_ACTIVE_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP or icb.END_ACTIVE_DATE is null)

SELECT ICB.CATEGORY_ID, ICT.CATEGORY_NAME FROM INV_CATEGORY_B ICB, INV_CATEGORY_TL ICT WHERE ICT.CATEGORY_ID = ICB.CATEGORY_ID AND ICB.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND ( ICB.END_ACTIVE_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR ICB.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL ) AND ICT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ICB.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID = 0
